titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to exclude services of certain providers from the skilled nursing facility prospective payment system, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 10/11/2001--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to: (1) exclude portable electrocardiograms, portable x-rays, and portable mammograms from payment under the skilled nursing facility prospective payment system; and (2) include as reasonable and necessary for Medicare reimbursement the costs of transportation of electrocardiogram equipment.
